product_name: The North Face Light Boot-Top Long Underwear Bottom's - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Whether you wear them under your ski pants or inside your sleeping bag, the Light Boot-Top long underwear bottoms from The North Face provide warmth with soft texture and a snug fit. Capri-length base layer pants provide optimal warmth and moisture management, and don't interfere with your boots. Lightweight, breathable FlashDry(TM) polyester wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly. Added stretch provides a close, comfortable fit. Elastic logo waistband; flatlock seams; 3/4-length legs. Closeout.
short_description: Whether you wear them under your ski pants or inside your sleeping bag, the Light Boot-Top long underwear bottoms from The North Face provide warmth with soft texture and a snug fit.
